name: Classic White T-Shirt
description: A timeless Classic White T-Shirt by StyleCo, crafted from soft, breathable cotton for all-day comfort. Perfect for casual outings or layering with your favorite jacket.

name: Blue Denim Jeans
description: Elevate your wardrobe with these Blue Denim Jeans from DenimPro. Designed with a slim fit and durable fabric, they offer style and comfort for any occasion.

name: Black Hoodie
description: Stay cozy with this Black Hoodie by UrbanWear. Featuring a soft fleece lining and a kangaroo pocket, it's ideal for chilly days and casual street style.

name: Casual Shorts
description: These Casual Shorts from StyleCo offer a relaxed fit and lightweight fabric, perfect for summer adventures or lounging at home.

name: Sports Jacket
description: Gear up with this Sports Jacket by ActiveGear. Water-resistant and breathable, it’s designed for outdoor workouts and active lifestyles.

name: Formal Shirt
description: This Formal Shirt by FormStyle combines crisp design with a tailored fit, making it a must-have for professional settings or formal events.

name: Summer Dress
description: Embrace warm days with this Summer Dress from Femina. Its flowy fabric and vibrant print make it perfect for picnics or beach outings.

name: Jogger Pants
description: These Jogger Pants by ActiveGear offer a comfortable fit with stretchable fabric, ideal for workouts, casual wear, or lounging.

name: Sweatshirt
description: Stay warm and stylish with this Sweatshirt by UrbanWear. Its soft fabric and relaxed fit make it a go-to for cozy evenings.

name: Printed Skirt
description: Add flair to your wardrobe with this Printed Skirt by Femina. Its vibrant pattern and comfortable fit are perfect for casual or semi-formal looks.

name: Leather Wallet
description: This Leather Wallet by LeatherWorks combines sleek design with practicality, featuring multiple compartments for cards and cash.

name: Analog Watch
description: Timeless elegance with this Analog Watch from TimeZone. Its sleek design and durable strap make it a versatile accessory for any occasion.

name: Sunglasses
description: Protect your eyes in style with these Sunglasses by ShadeUp. UV-protected lenses and a trendy frame make them perfect for sunny days.

name: Leather Belt
description: This Leather Belt by LeatherWorks adds a polished touch to any outfit. Crafted from genuine leather with a sturdy buckle for lasting use.

name: Canvas Backpack
description: Carry your essentials with this Canvas Backpack by BagPro. Spacious, durable, and stylish, it’s perfect for school, work, or travel.

name: Baseball Cap
description: Top off your look with this Baseball Cap from CapZone. Adjustable and comfortable, it’s great for casual outings or outdoor activities.

name: Scarf
description: Add warmth and style with this Scarf by StyleCo. Its soft fabric and elegant design make it a versatile accessory for any season.

name: Silver Bracelet
description: Elevate your style with this Silver Bracelet by Jewels. Its sleek design adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit.

name: Handbag
description: This Handbag by BagPro combines fashion and function with spacious compartments and a chic design, perfect for daily use.

name: Keychain Set
description: Keep your keys organized with this Keychain Set by LeatherWorks. Crafted from durable materials, it’s both practical and stylish.

name: Smartphone
description: Stay connected with this Smartphone by TechPro. Featuring a powerful processor, stunning display, and long-lasting battery for all your needs.

name: Bluetooth Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in music with these Bluetooth Headphones by SoundX. Enjoy crystal-clear sound and up to 20 hours of battery life.

name: Laptop
description: Boost productivity with this Laptop by CompTech. Equipped with a fast processor, ample storage, and a sleek design for work or play.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Enhance your workflow with this Wireless Mouse by TechPro. Ergonomic design and precise control make it ideal for work or gaming.

name: Smartwatch
description: Track your fitness and stay connected with this Smartwatch by TimeZone. Features heart rate monitoring and smartphone notifications.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Take the party anywhere with this Bluetooth Speaker by SoundX. Compact, powerful, and water-resistant for outdoor adventures.

name: Tablet
description: This Tablet by CompTech offers a vibrant display and powerful performance, perfect for streaming, gaming, or productivity on the go.

name: USB Flash Drive
description: Store and transfer files with ease using this USB Flash Drive by DataStore. Compact design with high-speed data transfer.

name: Power Bank
description: Keep your devices charged with this Power Bank by PowerMax. High-capacity and portable, perfect for travel or daily use.

name: Action Camera
description: Capture every adventure with this Action Camera by CamPro. Waterproof and durable with 4K video recording for stunning footage.

name: Decorative Vase
description: Add elegance to your space with this Decorative Vase by HomeDecor. Perfect for flowers or as a standalone accent piece.

name: Wall Clock
description: This Wall Clock by HomeDecor combines style and function with a modern design, perfect for any living room or office.

name: LED Table Lamp
description: Brighten your workspace with this LED Table Lamp by LightUp. Adjustable brightness and sleek design for modern homes.

name: Cushion Set
description: Add comfort and style with this Cushion Set by ComfyHome. Soft, durable, and perfect for refreshing your sofa or bed.

name: Kitchen Organizer
description: Keep your kitchen tidy with this Kitchen Organizer by OrganizePro. Space-saving design for utensils, spices, and more.

name: Wall Art
description: Transform your space with this Wall Art by Artify. Vibrant and modern, it’s perfect for adding personality to any room.

name: Table Runner
description: Elevate your dining experience with this Table Runner by HomeDecor. Stylish and durable, it adds charm to any table setting.

name: Floor Lamp
description: Illuminate your home with this Floor Lamp by LightUp. Its sleek design and warm lighting create a cozy ambiance.

name: Plant Pot
description: Display your plants in style with this Plant Pot by GardenPro. Durable and chic, it’s perfect for indoor or outdoor greenery.

name: Bed Sheet Set
description: Transform your bedroom with this Bed Sheet Set by ComfyHome. Soft, breathable, and stylish for a restful night’s sleep.
